t: GitHub - StevenJDH/Amazon-Stock-Tracker: A tool to monitor the in-stock status of products on Amazon for any country and notifies you with Voice, SMS, and Email alerts once new stock is detected.
s: Amazon Stock Tracker is a tool to monitor the in-stock status of products on Amazon for any country and notifies you with Voice, SMS, and Email alerts once new stock is detected. My motivation to create this was that I needed a tool that supported more than just the usual 5 to 7 countries.

t: Push Notification Service - Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) - AWS
